promptPrefix: I want you to act as an SEO Specialist and write a compelling and enticing SEO meta description for an e-commerce website selling home improvement products with only 155 character limit. Use the product title [PROMPT] as the keywords for the meta description. Make sure to include the price in the meta description and use words that reflects a sale, an on-going discount or promotion to entice users and give a sense of urgency. Write the meta description in [TARGETLANGUAGE] language
title: Enticing SEO Description for E-commerce
